about_the_game:
Five Finger Discount is all about getting that sweet adrenaline rush when stealing something.

Inspired by real life events, the story revolves around Michael, a young man who was just released out of prison on parole. He doesn't want to talk about his past, and just leave it behind, but he's just the same 💩 magnet that he always was.

Starting with some small mistakes that could happen to any law abiding citizen, he is forced very soon to commit some serious heists, or he will face the wrath of some very bad people.

Use your head, not your fists.

Michael swore to never commit violence, if you are detected you may try to run, but if you get busted, it's game over.

This game was designed to be as realistic as possible, with mechanics such as safe cracking, lock picking, and the use of debugging tools sourced from the dark net, all designed by real-life professionals.

The community is your strength.

If you need something, there surely is someone who can help you. You should talk to the NPCs you meet in the game or connect with other players on our discord server.

This game rewards skill rather than repetition.

You can break into a bank on the first day if you want. No unlocking a different skin by doing the same repetitive task 600 times.

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
